Blanchard, 0., Debt, Deficits, and Finite Horizons, Journal of Political Economy. (93) 1985.
Blanchard, 0. and R. Perotti, An Empirical Characterization of the Dynamic Effects of Fiscal Policy, mimeo, Department of Economics, Columbia University, April 1998.
